regen.absent_element: situation of consulting train data at any time
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data at any time.

regen.absent_element: manual data entry when the train is not stationary under special circumstances
regen.new_specification: In cases of emergency or special operations, the driver may be authorized to manually enter train data even when the train is not stationary.

regen.absent_element: consultation of data while the train is moving
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is moving, as long as it does not interfere with driving focus and safety.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
